hooks.name: format
hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv tool run ruff format >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }

hooks.name: lint and fix
hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv tool run ruff check --fix >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }

hooks.name: type-check
hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv tool run ty check >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
